title: i was perma banned but i dont know why

embed.description: PLEASE READ THIS TERMS OF USE AGREEMENT (THIS "TERMS OF USE" OR " AGREEMENT") CAREFULLY. BY CLICKING THE "ACCEPT" BUTTON BELOW, OR BY PARTICIPATING IN THE GAME, OR BY USING THE HTTP://NA.LEAGUEOFLEGENDS.COM WEBSITE AND RELATED WEBPAGES (THE " SITE "), YOU AGREE THAT THIS AGREEMENT IS ENFORCEABLE LIKE ANY WRITTEN CONTRACT SIGNED BY YOU.

body:
hello, 
i logged in today and it said that i was perma banned. no chat logs or something. it just said check your email for further details.
the email said that my actions where in violation with the league terms. and they gave me a link to the terms. i never offend people or something. does someone know why i am banned and what did i do to not listen to the term of use
